mr.gloss: a form of address for a man

mr..gloss: a form of address for a man

mrd.gloss: a machine-readable version of a standard dictionary

mrem.gloss: a dosage of ionizing radiation equivalent to one thousandth (1/1000) of a rem

mri.gloss: the use of nuclear magnetic resonance of protons to produce proton density images

mrs.gloss: a form of address for a married woman

mrs..gloss: a form of address for a married woman

mrs. gandhi.gloss: daughter of Nehru who served as prime minister of India from 1966 to 1977 (1917-1984)

mrs. henry wood.gloss: English writer of novels about murders and thefts and forgeries (1814-1887)

mrs. humphrey ward.gloss: English writer of novels who was an active opponent of the women's suffrage movement (1851-1920)

mrs. simpson.gloss: United States divorcee whose marriage to Edward VIII created a constitutional crisis leading to his abdication

mrta.gloss: a Marxist-Leninist terrorist organization in Peru
